notes: Browser automation unavailable; verification performed via code inspection. Manual spot checks confirm updated JS toggles visibility classes, applies focus handling, and suppresses duplicate close controls.

behaviors.open: Click/Enter/Space applies aria-expanded="true", removes hidden, adds .is-open
behaviors.close: Toggle/off click, Esc, or outside click restores aria-expanded="false", reapplies hidden
behaviors.focus: Focus returns to trigger on programmatic close except when another trigger receives the pointer
behaviors.position: Panels positioned relative to trigger with viewport guards
behaviors.duplicates: Secondary close buttons receive dup-x class and are hidden
